templateOptions.label: 5.2.1 Communication of the use of biological agents, hazardous chemicals, radioactive substances and/or nanoparticles

fieldGroup.template: Has the Prevention Service been informed that you are going to work with biological agents/material, hazardous chemicals, radioactive substances and/or nanoparticles?

The use of biological agents of group 2, 3 or 4 for the first time in a research activity should be reported.

A new notification will be made whenever substantial changes are introduced in a work process whose repercussions on health and safety conditions invalidate the previous notification. (Article 10 RD664/1997).
